register_last_name: Please enter your last name (or type /skip):
register_field_of_study: Please enter your field of study (or type /skip):
profile_not_found: Profile not found. Please register first using /register.
edit_profile_field: Which field do you want to edit? (first_name, last_name, age, country, field_of_study, email):
edit_profile_value: Please enter the new value for `{field}`:
isee_income: Please enter your total family income (in euros):
isee_property_size: Please enter the property size in square meters (or 0 if none):
isee_family_members: Please enter the number of family members (1-10):
consult_name: Let's start the consultation process. What is your full name?
consult_field: Which field of study are you interested in?
consult_gpa: What is your current GPA (Grade Point Average)?
consult_budget: What is your approximate budget for tuition per year (in euros)?
consult_language: What is your current Italian/English language proficiency level (e.g., A2, B1, C1)?
consult_success: Thank you! Your consultation request has been submitted. An admin will review your request and get back to you soon.
cost_of_living_breakdown: Here is a breakdown of average monthly expenses:
cost_of_living_no_data: Sorry, I couldn't retrieve the cost of living information at the moment.
live_chat_in_progress: You are already in a live chat session. Use /end_chat to finish it.
live_chat_request_sent: Connecting you to an admin... Please wait. Send your messages now.
live_chat_admin_connected: An admin has connected. You can now chat live.
live_chat_ended_by_user: You have ended the live chat.
live_chat_ended_by_admin: The admin has ended the chat session.
live_chat_not_in_session: You are not in a live chat session.
roommate_start: Are you currently looking for a roommate? (yes/no)
roommate_ask_budget: What is your monthly budget for rent? (e.g., 250-350)
roommate_ask_notes: Any additional notes about yourself or what you're looking for?
roommate_prefs_saved: Your roommate preferences have been saved! You can now use /find_roommate to search.
roommate_not_looking: Your roommate search status has been updated. You are not currently looking.
roommate_no_matches: Sorry, no matching roommates found at the moment. Try again later!
story_submit_start: That's great! Please write down your success story and send it to me. Tell us about your journey, challenges, and achievements.
story_submit_short: Your story seems a bit short. Please provide more details to inspire others!
story_submit_success: Thank you for sharing your story! It has been submitted for review and will be published after approval.
stories_title: Here are some success stories from our community:
stories_none: No success stories have been published yet. Be the first to share yours with /submit_story!
